actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend section 107 of the Energy Reorganization Act of 1974 (42 U.S.C. 5817) to provide for a referendum of the people on the question of locating a radioactive waste storage facility in a State.

summary.text: Amends the Energy Reorganization Act of 1974 to require that the Energy Research and Development Administration notify the appropriate State legislature of plans for radioactive waste storage facilities. Stipulates that such facilities shall not be constructed unless approved by a Statewide referendum.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 107 of the Energy Reorganization Act of 1974 (42 U.S.C. 5817) to provide for a referendum of the people on the question of locating a radioactive waste storage facility in a State.
